text.tspan: The female labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population aged 15 and older that
is economically active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 2020
Female labor force participation rate (%) in 1980
Data source: International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
